name: Komperdell Walker Powerlock Compact Pole - Unisex
description: This walking pole features a cork handle for comfort along on familiar trails or foreign footpaths.Ergonomic cork grips, with a comfortable curved handle.3-section design with aluminum sections.Powerlock 3.0 for secure adjustments.Adjustable straps.Includes trekking baskets.Tungsten-carbide flex tips.
